manifest.name: Virtual Footer
manifest.description: Display markdown text (including dataview queries or Obsidian bases) at the bottom or top of all notes which match a specified rule, without modifying them.
manifest.author: Signynt

data.manifestValue: Display markdown text (including dataview queries or Obsidian bases) at the bottom or top of all notes which match a specified rule, without modifying them.
data.communityListValue: Display markdown text (including dataview queries) at the bottom of all notes in a folder, without modifying them.
